column1: Practice Analysis - Part 1 - Deep dive - all KPIs

column7: How-to pages use helpful page code.
Q&A pages use helpful page code.
FAQs use the right page code.
Headings and HTML are used correctly.
Writing is easy for anyone to read.
FAQ answers are long enough to help.
Booking has as few steps as possible.
A big “Book/Call” button shows without scrolling.
Options exist for nights or weekends.
Privacy policy is easy to find.
People with disabilities can use the site.
Before/after photos are easy to view.
Check site for if practice has a membership plan
Messaging is turned on and checked.
Google Business Profile is filled out.
Facebook page is active and linked.

column5: Desktop Performance (each carries Core Web Vitals thresholds for LCP, CLS, INP)

column7: Special code that marks “Book an appointment.”
Special code for a page of FAQs.
Special code saying “we’re a local business.”
A simple list of your pages for Google.
A tiny file that tells Google what to visit.
Right page is marked as the main one.
Plain-talk Q&A is on the site.
Staff training and licenses are shown.
Calls are counted with tracking numbers.
The booking tool is easy to use.
Pictures and videos look good and load fast.
